1 thing bothers me about all these supposed aXXo releases,  I quote aXXo's own words from his own release section of Darkside RGs site, 

 "MY RELEASES ARE ALWAYS .AVI AS IS. NO SPECIAL SOFTWARE IS REQUIRED. YOU NEED TO HAVE THE RIGHT FREE CODECS INSTALLED ONLY

aXXo RELEASES ARE NEVER RARED OR PASSWORDED, IF YOU FIND THEM ELSEWHERE DON'T DOWNLOAD, THEY WILL BE FAKES OR A SCAM FOR SURE.

ALSO REMEMBER : TORRENTS WITH THE aXXo TAG NOT LISTED ON THIS FORUM ARE FAKES OR THE TORRENT IS DEAD "

and the last dated release on that site is dates in 2008,plus I'd also heard from other sources that he had stopped releasing a couple of years ago so how come these all claim to be his work? 
I'm not saying they are fakes, with the number of releases on this account I seriously doupt they are fake, just questioning who actually ripped them and why they feel they have to use someone elses name instead of their own.

I've downloaded Sceneline torrents. The few I have downloaded are legit. I've read many comments from the dummies here literally leeching and never providing. Sceneline I'll check in on your torrents from time to time when I need a quality SMALL movie file.

Ripping at 700Mb's is easy and Sceneline is doing a good job. Stop complaining....
